segment.source: Presentation #
segment.target: Presentation #

segment.source: This addon was created following a request from a member on the nvda-addons mailing list.
segment.target: This addon was created following a request from a member on the nvda-addons mailing list.

segment.source: It provides a script without gesture, which allows to retrieve and give the language of the current keyboard.
segment.target: It provides a script without gesture, which allows to retrieve and give the language of the current keyboard.

segment.source: If pressed twice, gives the default language of the system.
segment.target: If pressed twice, gives the default language of the system.

segment.source: At the first version of this module, it had been proposed as simple globalPlugin to paste in the configuration directory of NVDA, it was then transformed into addon.
segment.target: At the first version of this module, it had been proposed as simple globalPlugin to paste in the configuration directory of NVDA, it was then transformed into addon.

segment.source: Notes ##
segment.target: Notes ##

segment.source: To set a gesture to the script giving the keyboard language, follow these steps:
segment.target: To set a gesture to the script giving the keyboard language, follow these steps:

segment.source: Open the NVDA's menu, with "NVDA + N";
segment.target: Open the NVDA's menu, with "NVDA + N";

segment.source: Go to NVDA's preferences menu;
segment.target: Go to NVDA's preferences menu;

segment.source: Then go to the submenu "Input gestures".
segment.target: Then go to the submenu "Input gestures".

segment.source: Then select the category "Input", and open it with right arrow.
segment.target: Then select the category "Input", and open it with right arrow.

segment.source: Go to the item labeled "Gives the language of the keyboard in use, if pressed twice, give the default language of the system";
segment.target: Go to the item labeled "Gives the language of the keyboard in use, if pressed twice, give the default language of the system";

segment.source: Once done, press Alt + A to add a gesture, and type "NVDA + F4" or another gesture of your choice;
segment.target: Once done, press Alt + A to add a gesture, and type "NVDA + F4" or another gesture of your choice;

segment.source: This done, press the up arrow once, you hear "your chosen gesture, all layout";
segment.target: This done, press the up arrow once, you hear "your chosen gesture, all layout";

segment.source: Validate on enter, then tab to OK then enter;
segment.target: Validate on enter, then tab to OK then enter;

segment.source: Your chosen gesture should then call the script giving keyboard language.
segment.target: Your chosen gesture should then call the script giving keyboard language.
